DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study breast cervical cancer educational intervention Latinas Western New York . An outreach program may help minority cancer patient overcome problem keep receive cancer screening .
DOC.brief_title: Breast Cervical Cancer Educational Intervention Latinas Western New York
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Investigate extent linguistic cultural tailor necessary adapt Esperanza Vida outreach program Hispanics Western New York . II . Evaluate effectiveness Esperanza Vida program intervention increase breast cervical cancer knowledge screen behavior Hispanic participant compare control health education program diabetes . III . Determine factor associate and/or predictive screening Hispanics Western New York ( WNY ) compare New York City ( NYC ) Arkansas describe intervention impact barrier motivation screen diverse Hispanic population . OUTLINE : Key informant interview local `` gatekeeper '' Hispanic culture group WNY focus group Hispanic cancer survivor screen unscreened participant conduct first phase research . Participants randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants engage Esperanza Vida educational information session breast cervical cancer . ARM II : Participants engage educational information session diabetes . After completion study treatment , participant follow 2 8 month .
